dct_title_s: Phelps & Watson's historical and military map of the border & southern states
dct_description_sm: "Entered according to Act of Congress; in the year 1862 by Phelps & Watson." Includes list of "Battles of the war" from April 12, 1861, to May 12, 1864. For other editions, see Civil War Maps entry nos. 43.8, 53.2, and 80.3. Description derived from published bibliography.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, Gaylord Watson, successor to Phelps & Watson, 1865.
